value.string:
<office:document-content xmlns:office="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:office:1.0"
 xmlns:style="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:style:1.0"
 xmlns:text="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:text:1.0"
 xmlns:table="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:table:1.0"
 xmlns:draw="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:drawing:1.0"
 xmlns:fo="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:xsl-fo-compatible:1.0"
 xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
 xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"
 xmlns:meta="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:meta:1.0"
 xmlns:number="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:datastyle:1.0"
 xmlns:svg="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:svg-compatible:1.0"
 xmlns:chart="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:chart:1.0"
 xmlns:dr3d="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:dr3d:1.0" 
 xmlns:math="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"
 xmlns:form="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:form:1.0"
 xmlns:script="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:script:1.0"
 xmlns:ooo="http://openoffice.org/2004/office"
 xmlns:ooow="http://openoffice.org/2004/writer"
 xmlns:oooc="http://openoffice.org/2004/calc"
 xmlns:dom="http://www.w3.org/2001/xml-events"
 xmlns:xforms="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms"
 xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
 xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
 xmlns:tal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal"
 xmlns:metal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal"
 xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" 
 office:version="1.0"
 >
 
 <tal:block tal:define="global form python: getattr(here, request.chart_form_id) ;
 global listbox python: getattr(form, request.chart_field_id);
 global line_list python: listbox.get_value('default',context=here, render_format='list', REQUEST=request);
 global line_count python:len(line_list);
 global column_list python:line_list[0].getColumnItemList();
 global column_count python:len(column_list);
 global col_char python:'B';
 global chart_type request/chart_type;
 global series_source request/series_source;
 global user_column_id_dict request/user_column_id_dict;
 global user_data_title request/user_data_title;
 global grid_graph request/grid_graph;
 global data_label_text request/data_label_text;
 global position_legend request/position_legend;"/>
 
 <office:automatic-styles>
 <number:number-style style:name="N0">
 <number:number number:min-integer-digits="1"/>
 </number:number-style>
 <style:style style:name="chart_frame" style:family="chart">
 <style:graphic-properties draw:stroke="none"
 svg:stroke-width="0cm"
 svg:stroke-color="#000000"
 draw:fill-color="#FFFFFF"
 draw:opacity="100%"/>
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:name="chart_title" style:family="chart">
 <style:chart-properties style:direction="ltr"/>
 <style:graphic-properties draw:stroke="none" draw:fill="none"/>
 <style:text-properties fo:font-family="'DejaVu Sans'"
 style:font-family-generic="swiss"
 style:font-pitch="variable"
 fo:font-size="35pt"
 style:font-family-asian="'DejaVu Sans'"
 style:font-family-generic-asian="system"
 style:font-pitch-asian="variable"
 style:font-size-asian="35pt"
 style:font-family-complex="Tahoma"
 style:font-family-generic-complex="system"
 style:font-pitch-complex="variable"
 style:font-size-complex="35pt"/>
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:name="chart_legend" style:family="chart">
 <style:graphic-properties draw:fill="none"/>
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/OOoChart_macroLibrary/macros/style_text_properties" />
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:name="chart_picture" style:family="chart">
 <style:chart-properties tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:bar'"
 chart:mean-value="false"
 chart:error-margin="0"
 chart:error-lower-limit="0"
 chart:error-upper-limit="0"
 chart:error-percentage="0"
 chart:error-category="none"
 chart:stock-with-volume="false"
 chart:japanese-candle-stick="false"
 tal:attributes="chart:three-dimensional request/chart_three_dimensional | string:false;
 chart:deep request/deep ;
 chart:stacked request/chart_stacked | string:false;
 chart:vertical request/chart_position | string:false;
 chart:percentage request/chart_percentage | string:false;
 chart:symbol-type request/symbol_type ;
 chart:series-source request/series_source;
 chart:connect-bars request/connect_bars;
 chart:data-label-number request/data_label_number ;
 chart:data-label-symbol request/data_label_symbol | string:false;
 chart:data-label-text request/data_label_text | string:false ;
 chart:lines-used request/lines_used | string:0;
 chart:regression-type request/regression_type ;
 chart:interpolation request/interpolation ;
 "/>
 <style:chart-properties tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:line'"
 chart:mean-value="false"
 chart:error-margin="0"
 chart:error-lower-limit="0"
 chart:error-upper-limit="0"
 chart:error-percentage="0"
 chart:error-category="none"
 chart:stock-with-volume="false"
 chart:japanese-candle-stick="false"
 chart:lines="true"
 chart:connect-bars="false"
 chart:lines-used="0"
 tal:attributes="chart:three-dimensional request/chart_three_dimensional | string:false;
 chart:deep request/deep ;
 chart:stacked request/chart_stacked | string:false;
 chart:vertical request/chart_position | string:false;
 chart:percentage request/chart_percentage | string:false;
 chart:symbol-type request/symbol_type ;
 chart:series-source request/series_source;
 chart:data-label-number request/data_label_number ;
 chart:data-label-symbol request/data_label_symbol | string:false;
 chart:data-label-text request/data_label_text | string:false ;
 chart:regression-type request/regression_type ;
 chart:interpolation request/interpolation ;
 "/>
 <style:chart-properties tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:circle'"
 chart:mean-value="false"
 chart:error-margin="0"
 chart:error-lower-limit="0"
 chart:error-upper-limit="0"
 chart:error-percentage="0"
 chart:error-category="none"
 chart:stock-with-volume="false"
 chart:japanese-candle-stick="false"
 chart:lines="false"
 tal:attributes="chart:three-dimensional request/chart_three_dimensional | string:false;
 chart:deep request/deep ;
 chart:vertical request/chart_position | string:false;
 chart:percentage request/chart_percentage | string:false;
 chart:symbol-type request/symbol_type ;
 chart:series-source request/series_source;
 chart:connect-bars request/connect_bars;
 chart:data-label-number request/data_label_number ;
 chart:data-label-symbol request/data_label_symbol | string:false;
 chart:data-label-text request/data_label_text | string:false ;
 chart:lines-used request/lines_used | string:0;
 chart:regression-type request/regression_type ;
 chart:interpolation request/interpolation ;
 "/>
 <style:chart-properties tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:scatter'"
 chart:mean-value="false"
 chart:error-margin="0"
 chart:error-lower-limit="0"
 chart:error-upper-limit="0"
 chart:error-percentage="0"
 chart:error-category="none"
 chart:stock-with-volume="false"
 chart:japanese-candle-stick="false"
 chart:stacked="false"
 chart:lines="false"
 chart:lines-used="0"
 tal:attributes="chart:three-dimensional request/chart_three_dimensional | string:false;
 chart:deep request/deep ;
 chart:vertical request/chart_position | string:false;
 chart:percentage request/chart_percentage | string:false;
 chart:symbol-type request/symbol_type ;
 chart:series-source request/series_source;
 chart:connect-bars request/connect_bars;
 chart:data-label-number request/data_label_number ;
 chart:data-label-symbol request/data_label_symbol | string:false;
 chart:data-label-text request/data_label_text | string:false ;
 chart:regression-type request/regression_type ;
 chart:interpolation request/interpolation ;
 "/>
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:name="chart_x_axis" 
 style:family="chart" 
 style:data-style-name="N0">
 <style:chart-properties chart:display-label="true" 
 chart:tick-marks-major-inner="true"
 chart:tick-marks-major-outer="true"
 chart:logarithmic="false"
 chart:text-overlap="true"
 text:line-break="true"
 chart:label-arrangement="side-by-side"
 chart:visible="true"
 style:direction="ltr"/>
 <style:graphic-properties draw:stroke="solid"
 svg:stroke-width="0cm"
 svg:stroke-color="#000000"/>
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/OOoChart_macroLibrary/macros/style_text_properties" />
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:name="chart_y_axis"
 style:family="chart"
 style:data-style-name="N0">
 <style:chart-properties chart:display-label="true"
 chart:tick-marks-major-inner="true"
 chart:tick-marks-major-outer="true"
 chart:logarithmic="false"
 chart:origin="0"
 chart:gap-width="100"
 chart:overlap="0"
 chart:text-overlap="false"
 text:line-break="false"
 chart:label-arrangement="side-by-side"
 chart:visible="true"
 style:direction="ltr"/>
 <style:graphic-properties draw:stroke="solid"
 svg:stroke-width="0cm"
 svg:stroke-color="#000000"/>
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/OOoChart_macroLibrary/macros/style_text_properties" />
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:family="chart" style:name="sector_pie">
 <style:chart-properties tal:attributes="chart:pie-offset python:request.sector_pie_offset;"/>
 </style:style>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:line' and series_source=='columns'">
 <style:style style:family="chart" style:name="data_line_rows">
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/OOoChart_macroLibrary/macros/style_text_properties" />
 </style:style>
 </tal:block>
 <style:style style:family="chart" style:name="other_style">
 <style:graphic-properties svg:stroke-color='#000000'
 draw:stroke="solid"
 svg:stroke-width="0.01cm"/>
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/OOoChart_macroLibrary/macros/style_text_properties" />
 </style:style>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <!-- style for chart:bar and serie data columns-->
 <style:style tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:bar' and series_source=='columns'"
 style:family="chart"
 tal:attributes="style:name python:'data_bar_%s' % column_item[0]">
 <style:graphic-properties svg:stroke-color='#000000'
 tal:attributes="draw:fill-color python:request.colour_column_dict.get(column_item[0]);
 "/>
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/OOoChart_macroLibrary/macros/style_text_properties" />
 </style:style>
 
 <!-- style for chart:line and serie data columns-->
 <style:style tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:line' or chart_type=='chart:scatter' and series_source=='columns'"
 style:family="chart"
 tal:attributes="style:name python:'data_line_%s' % column_item[0]">
 <style:graphic-properties tal:attributes="svg:stroke-color python:request.colour_column_dict.get(column_item[0]); "/>
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/OOoChart_macroLibrary/macros/style_text_properties" />
 </style:style>
 
 <!-- style for chart:circle and series data rows-->
 <style:style tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:circle' and series_source=='rows'"
 style:family="chart"
 tal:attributes="style:name python:'data_circle_%s' % column_item[0]">
 
 <style:graphic-properties svg:stroke-color='#000000'
 tal:attributes="draw:fill-color python:request.colour_column_dict.get(column_item[0]);
 "/>
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/OOoChart_macroLibrary/macros/style_text_properties" />
 </style:style>
 </tal:block>
 <style:style style:name="chart_wall" 
 style:family="chart">
 <style:graphic-properties draw:stroke="none"
 draw:fill="none"/>
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:name="chart_floor"
 style:family="chart">
 <style:graphic-properties draw:stroke="none"
 draw:fill-color="#999999"/>
 </style:style>
 </office:automatic-styles>
 
 <office:body>
 <office:chart>
 <chart:chart svg:width="30cm"
 svg:height="30cm"
 chart:style-name="chart_frame"
 tal:attributes="chart:class request/chart_type ;">
 <tal:block tal:define="bool request/chart_title_or_no"
 tal:condition="python:bool=='true'">
 <chart:title chart:style-name="chart_title">
 <text:p tal:content="request/chart_title | string:User Statistics">
 User Statistics
 </text:p>
 </chart:title>
 </tal:block>
 <!-- Legend Of The Graph-->
 <chart:legend tal:define="bool request/chart_legend"
 tal:condition="python:bool=='true'"
 tal:attributes="chart:legend-position position_legend"
 chart:style-name="chart_legend" />
 <!-- Graph according chart_type. Here: chart:line or chart:bar or chart:scatter-->
 <chart:plot-area tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:bar'
 or chart_type=='chart:line' or chart_type=='chart:scatter'"
 chart:style-name="chart_picture">
 <chart:axis chart:dimension="x"
 chart:name="primary-x"
 chart:style-name="chart_x_axis">
 <chart:categories tal:attributes="table:cell-range-address python:'local-table.A2:.A%s' % line_count"/>
 </chart:axis>
 <chart:axis chart:dimension="y"
 chart:name="primary-y"
 chart:style-name="chart_y_axis">
 <chart:grid tal:condition="python:grid_graph=='true'"
 tal:attributes="chart:class request/grid_size | string:major ;" />
 </chart:axis>
 
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:chart_type == 'chart:scatter'
 and series_source == 'columns'
 and len(user_column_id_dict.keys()) == 0"
 tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <chart:series tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, line_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;
 chart:style-name python:'data_line_%s' % column_item[0];">
 <chart:data-point tal:attributes="chart:repeated line_count"/>
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:chart_type == 'chart:scatter'
 and series_source == 'columns'
 and len(user_column_id_dict.keys()) != 0"
 tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <chart:series tal:condition="python:user_column_id_dict.has_key(column_item[0])"
 tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, line_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;
 chart:style-name python:'data_line_%s' % column_item[0];">
 <chart:data-point tal:attributes="chart:repeated line_count"/>
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:bar'
 and series_source=='columns' 
 and len(user_column_id_dict.keys())!=0"
 tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <chart:series tal:condition="python:user_column_id_dict.has_key(column_item[0])"
 tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, line_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;
 chart:style-name python:'data_bar_%s' % column_item[0];">
 <chart:data-point tal:attributes="chart:repeated line_count"/>
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: chart_type == 'chart:bar'
 and series_source == 'columns'
 and len(user_column_id_dict.keys()) == 0"
 tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <chart:series tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, line_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;
 chart:style-name python:'data_bar_%s' % column_item[0];">
 <chart:data-point tal:attributes="chart:repeated line_count"/>
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:chart_type == 'chart:bar'
 and series_source == 'rows'"
 tal:repeat="line_item python:line_list">
 <chart:series chart:style-name="other_style"
 tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, column_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;">
 <chart:data-point tal:attributes="chart:repeated column_count"/>
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:chart_type == 'chart:line'
 or chart_type == 'chart:scatter'
 and series_source == 'rows'"
 tal:repeat="line_item python:line_list">
 <chart:series chart:style-name="data_line_rows"
 tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, column_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;">
 <chart:data-point tal:attributes="chart:repeated column_count"/>
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:chart_type=='chart:line'
 and series_source=='columns'
 and len(user_column_id_dict.keys())"
 tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:user_column_id_dict.has_key(column_item[0]) ">
 <chart:series tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address
 python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, column_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;
 chart:style-name python:'data_line_%s' % column_item[0];">
 <chart:data-point tal:attributes="chart:repeated python:line_count"/>
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:chart_type == 'chart:line'
 and series_source == 'columns'
 and len(user_column_id_dict.keys()) == 0"
 tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <chart:series tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, column_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;
 chart:style-name python:'data_line_%s' % column_item[0];">
 <chart:data-point tal:attributes="chart:repeated python:line_count"/>
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 <chart:wall chart:style-name="chart_wall"/>
 <chart:floor chart:style-name="chart_floor"/>
 </chart:plot-area>
 
 <!-- Graph according chart_type and series_source. Here: chart:circle and data in columns-->
 <chart:plot-area tal:condition="python:chart_type == 'chart:circle'
 and series_source == 'columns' "
 chart:style-name="chart_picture">
 <chart:axis chart:dimension="y"
 chart:name="primary-y"
 chart:style-name="chart_y_axis">
 </chart:axis>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <chart:series tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, column_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;">
 <chart:data-point tal:attributes="chart:repeated python:line_count"
 chart:style-name="sector_pie"/>
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 </chart:plot-area>
 <!-- Graph according chart_type and series_source. Here: chart:circle and data in rows-->
 <chart:plot-area tal:condition="python:chart_type == 'chart:circle'
 and series_source == 'rows'"
 chart:style-name="chart_picture">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:len(user_column_id_dict.keys()) == 0"
 tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <chart:series tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, line_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;
 chart:style-name python:'data_circle_%s' % column_item[0];">
 <chart:data-point chart:style-name="sector_pie"
 tal:attributes="chart:repeated python:column_count" />
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:len(user_column_id_dict.keys()) != 0"
 tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:]">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:user_column_id_dict.has_key(column_item[0])">
 <chart:series tal:attributes="chart:values-cell-range-address python:'local-table.%s2:.%s%s' % (col_char, col_char, line_count);
 chart:label-cell-address python:'local-table.%s1' % col_char;
 chart:style-name python:'data_circle_%s' % column_item[0];">
 <chart:data-point chart:style-name="sector_pie"
 tal:attributes="chart:repeated column_count" />
 </chart:series>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </chart:plot-area>
 
 <!-- Storage all ListBox Data in Spreadsheet-->
 <table:table tal:condition="python:len(user_column_id_dict.keys()) == 0"
 table:name="local-table">
 <table:table-header-columns>
 <table:table-column/>
 </table:table-header-columns>
 <table:table-columns>
 <table:table-column tal:attributes="table:number-columns-repeated column_count"/>
 </table:table-columns>
 
 <table:table-header-rows>
 <table:table-row>
 <table:table-cell office:value-type="string">
 <text:p></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 <table:table-cell tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:] "
 office:value-type="string">
 <text:p tal:content="python:column_item[1]"
 i18n:domain="ui"
 i18n:translate="">Documents</text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </table:table-row>
 </table:table-header-rows>
 
 <table:table-rows>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="line python:line_list[1:]">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: line.isDataLine()"> 
 <table:table-row>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item column_list">
 <tal:block tal:define="column_id python:column_item[0];
 column_type python:line.getColumnPropertyTypeName(column_id);
 column_value python:line.getColumnProperty(column_id);
 value_type python:((column_type in ('float', 'int', 'long',)) and 'float') or 'string'">
 <table:table-cell tal:condition="python: value_type=='string'"
 tal:attributes="office:value-type value_type">
 <text:p tal:content="python:column_value"
 i18n:domain="ui"
 i18n:translate=""></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 <table:table-cell
 tal:condition="python:value_type != 'string'"
 tal:attributes="office:value python:column_value;
 office:value-type value_type">
 <text:p></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-row>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-rows>
 </table:table>
 
 <!-- Storage Data given by user in Spreadsheet-->
 <table:table tal:condition="python:len(user_column_id_dict.keys()) != 0"
 table:name="local-table">
 <table:table-header-columns>
 <table:table-column/>
 </table:table-header-columns>
 <table:table-columns>
 <table:table-column tal:attributes="table:number-columns-repeated python:len(user_column_id_dict.keys())"/>
 </table:table-columns>
 <table:table-header-rows>
 <table:table-row>
 <table:table-cell office:value-type="string">
 <text:p></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item python:column_list[1:] ">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:user_column_id_dict.has_key(column_item[0]) ">
 <table:table-cell office:value-type="string">
 <text:p tal:content="python:column_item[1]"
 i18n:domain="ui"
 i18n:translate="">Documents</text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-row>
 </table:table-header-rows>
 <table:table-rows>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="line python:line_list[1:]">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: line.isDataLine()">
 <table:table-row>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item column_list">
 <tal:block tal:define="column_id python:column_item[0];">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:user_data_title != ''">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:user_data_title == column_id"
 tal:define="column_value python:line.getColumnProperty(column_id);">
 <table:table-cell tal:attributes="office:value-type python:'string'">
 <text:p tal:content="column_value"></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:user_data_title == ''"
 tal:define="column_id python:column_list[0][0];
 column_type python:line.getColumnPropertyTypeName(column_id);
 column_value python:line.getColumnProperty(column_id);">
 <table:table-cell tal:attributes="office:value-type python:'string'">
 <text:p tal:content="column_value"></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item column_list">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:user_column_id_dict.has_key(column_item[0]) ">
 <tal:block tal:define="column_id python:column_item[0];
 column_type python:line.getColumnPropertyTypeName(column_id);
 column_value python:line.getColumnProperty(column_id);
 value_type python:((column_type in ('float', 'int', 'long',)) and 'float') or 'string'">
 <table:table-cell tal:condition="python: value_type == 'string'"
 tal:attributes="office:value-type value_type">
 <text:p tal:content="column_value"></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 <table:table-cell tal:condition="python:value_type != 'string'"
 tal:attributes="office:value python:column_value;
 office:value-type value_type">
 <text:p></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-row>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-rows>
 </table:table>
 </chart:chart>
 </office:chart>
 </office:body>
 </office:document-content>
